sentence: He served as an aide to Democratic National Committee chair Terry McAuliffe during the 2003-2004 election cycle before returning to work for Sen. Clinton's campaign committee for Clinton's 2006 re-election campaign and part of her 2008 presidential primary campaign.

examples.sentence: ...which merged with the progressive conservative party of canada in 2003 to form...
